attributes.action: Dvla should introduce the Romanian language for the theoretical exams
attributes.additional_details: I want to introduce Romanian language because in the UK there are already more than 400k Romanians who do not have their driving license because they have the English language barrier.
attributes.background: I just want to see it adopted by the government to see the English road always safe.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570754
